document_data.name: Caravanserai of the Twisted Sword
document_data.mainbody: The '''Caravanserai of the Twisted Sword''' was a small [[caravanserai]] located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Caravanserai of the Twisted Sword was located along the [[Silk Road]] within the [[Quarters of the Unclean]] district in east Dhaztanar. It lay in the northern section of the district near the [[Tarkhold River]].
